nly-link/href.description: Denotes the target URL of the link for standard a links

nly-link/rel.description: Sets the 'rel' attribute on the rendered link

nly-link/target.description: Sets the 'target' attribute on the rendered link

nly-link/active.description: When set to 'true', places the component in the active state with active styling

nly-link/disabled.description: When set to 'true', disables the component's functionality and places it in a disabled state

nly-link/to.description: router-link prop: Denotes the target route of the link. When clicked, the value of the to prop will be passed to router.push() internally, so the value can be either a string or a Location descriptor object

nly-link/append.description: router-link prop: Setting append prop always appends the relative path to the current path

nly-link/replace.description: router-link prop: Setting the replace prop will call 'router.replace()' instead of 'router.push()' when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record

nly-link/event.description: router-link prop: Specify the event that triggers the link. In most cases you should leave this as the default

nly-link/active-class.description: router-link prop: Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active. Typically you will want to set this to class name 'active'

nly-link/exact.description: router-link prop: The default active class matching behavior is inclusive match. Setting this prop forces the mode to exactly match the route

nly-link/exact-active-class.description: router-link prop: Configure the active CSS class applied when the link is active with exact match. Typically you will want to set this to class name 'active'

nly-link/router-tag.description: router-link prop: Specify which tag to render, and it will still listen to click events for navigation. 'router-tag' translates to the tag prop on the final rendered router-link. Typically you should use the default value

nly-link/no-prefetch.description: nuxt-link prop: To improve the responsiveness of your Nuxt.js applications, when the link will be displayed within the viewport, Nuxt.js will automatically prefetch the code splitted page. Setting 'no-prefetch' will disabled this feature for the specific link

nly-table/id.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

nly-table/items.description: Array of items to display, or an items provider function reference. Refer to the docs for details

nly-table/fields.description: Array of field names or array of field definition objects

nly-table/primary-key.description: Name of a table field that contains a guaranteed unique value per row. Needed for tbody transition support, and also speeds up table rendering

nly-table/value.description: Currently displayed row data. Read-only. Do not set a value on this prop

nly-table/striped.description: Applies striping to the tbody rows

nly-table/bordered.description: Adds borders to all the cells and headers

nly-table/outlined.description: Adds an outline border to the table element

nly-table/dark.description: Places the table in dark mode

nly-table/small.description: Renders the table with smaller cell padding

nly-table/fixed.description: Makes all columns equal width (fixed layout table). Will speed up rendering for large tables. Column widths can be set via CSS or colgroup

nly-table/responsive.description: Makes the table responsive in width, adding a horizontal scrollbar. Set to true for always responsive or set to one of the breakpoints to switch from responsive to normal: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'

nly-table/sticky-header.description: Makes the table header sticky. Set to true for a maximum height 300px tall table, or set to any valid CSS hight (including units)

nly-table/no-border-collapse.description: Disable's the collapsing of table borders. Useful when table has sticky headers or columns

nly-table/caption-top.description: Visually place the table caption above the table. Default is below.

nly-table/table-variant.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the entire table

nly-table/table-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the table element

nly-table/stacked.description: Place the table in stacked mode. Set to true for always stacked, or set to one of the breakpoints to switch from stacked to normal: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'

nly-table/head-variant.description: Header variant: 'light' or 'dark', or unset. May take precedence over head-row-variant

nly-table/head-row-variant.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the tr element in the thead

nly-table/thead-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the thead element

nly-table/thead-tr-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the thead

nly-table/foot-clone.description: Enable to the footer of the table, and clone the header content by default

nly-table/foot-variant.description: Footer variant: 'light' or 'dark', or unset. May take precedence over foot-row-variant

nly-table/foot-row-variant.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the tr element in the tfoot. Falls back to head-row-variant

nly-table/tfoot-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tfoot element

nly-table/tfoot-tr-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the tfoot

nly-table/tbody-tr-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the tbody. Can be a function that returns a class (see docs for details)

nly-table/tbody-tr-attr.description: Attributes to be added to each tr in the tbody, or a function returning such attributes (see docs for details)

nly-table/details-td-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the td element in the details row

nly-table/tbody-transition-props.description: Vue 'transition-group' properties. When provided will make the tbody a Vue 'transition-group' component

nly-table/tbody-transition-handlers.description: Vue 'transition-group' event handlers. When provided will make the tbody a Vue 'transition-group' component

nly-table/tbody-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tbody element

nly-table/filter.description: Criteria for filtering. Internal filtering supports only string or RegExpr criteria.

nly-table/filter-function.description: Reference to a function to use instead of the internal filtering function. Refer to the docs for details

nly-table/filter-ignored-fields.description: Array of top level fields to ignore when filtering the item data

nly-table/filter-included-fields.description: Array of fields to include when filtering. Overrides filter-ignore-fields

nly-table/filter-debounce.description: Time in milliseconds to debounce changes to the filter criteria before filtering the records

nly-table/sort-by.description: Field name that is currently being sorted. Set to null to clear sorting. Syncable with the .sync prop modifier

nly-table/sort-desc.description: Set to true to sort the column in descending order. Syncable with the .sync prop modifier

nly-table/sort-direction.description: The initial sorting direction to sort an unsorted column by: 'asc', 'desc', or 'last' (to use the previous sort direction)

nly-table/sort-compare.description: A reference to a function for sort-comparing two rows of data. Defaults to the internal sort compare routine. See docs for details

nly-table/sort-compare-options.description: An object containing sort configuration for the 'String.prototype.sortLocale' method. See docs for details

nly-table/sort-compare-locale.description: The locale string (or array of locale string) that specified the language when sorting. See docs for details

nly-table/sort-null-last.description: When sorting, null and undefined values will be sorted first (or last, depending on 'sort-desc'). Set this prop to sort null values last. Only applicable to internal sorting

nly-table/no-sort-reset.description: When a table is sortable, clicking on any non-sortable column heading will clear the current sort values. Set this prop to disable this feature

nly-table/label-sort-asc.description: Hidden string to place in the header cell when clicking the cell will change the sort direction to ascending

nly-table/label-sort-desc.description: Hidden string to place in the header cell when clicking the cell will change the sort direction to descending

nly-table/label-sort-clear.description: Hidden string to place in the header cell when clicking the cell will clear the current sorting direction

nly-table/no-local-sorting.description: Disabled the internal sorting routine, and expects the user to provde the items sorted. Sorting controls will still be available

nly-table/no-footer-sorting.description: When the build in formatter is used, setting this prop will disable the sorting ability in the footer

nly-table/sort-icon-left.description: Positions the sort control to the left of the header text. Default is on the right of the header text

nly-table/per-page.description: Number of rows to show per page. Set to 0 to disable pagination

nly-table/current-page.description: The current page number to display when the table is paginated. Starting from 1 and up

nly-table/caption.description: Text string to place in the caption element

nly-table/caption-html.description: HTML string to place in the caption element. Use with caution

nly-table/selectable.description: When set, places the table body rows in selectable mode

nly-table/select-mode.description: The selectable mode for the table when 'selectable' is set. Possible values: 'single', 'multi' or 'range'

nly-table/selected-variant.description: Bootstrap color theme variant to set selected rows to. Use any of the standard Bootstrap theme color variants, or the special table row variant 'active' (default). Set to an empty string to not use a variant

nly-table/no-select-on-click.description: Disables row selection via click events. Row selection will be only available programmatically

nly-table/show-empty.description: When enabled, and there are no item records to show, shows a message that there are no rows to show

nly-table/empty-text.description: Text string to show when the table has no items to show

nly-table/empty-html.description: HTML string to show when the table has no items to show. Use with caution

nly-table/empty-filtered-text.description: Text string to show when the table has no items to show due to filtering

nly-table/empty-filtered-html.description: HTML string to show when the table has no items to show due to filtering. Use with caution

nly-table/busy.description: When set, forces the table into the busy state.Automatically set when an items provider function is being called

nly-table/no-provider-paging.description: When set, uses internal paging to pagination the data. Otherwise the items provider is expected to perform the paging

nly-table/no-provider-sorting.description: When set, uses internal sorting to sort the data. Otherwise the items provider is expected to perform the sorting

nly-table/no-provider-filtering.description: When set, uses internal filtering to pagination the data. Otherwise the provider is expected to perform the filtering

nly-table/api-url.description: Pass through prop. Passed as part of the context object sent to the items provider function

nly-table-lite/id.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

nly-table-lite/fields.description: Array of field names or array of field definition objects

nly-table-lite/primary-key.description: Name of a table field that contains a guaranteed unique value per row. Needed for tbody transition support, and also speeds up table rendering

nly-table-lite/value.description: Currently displayed row data. Read-only. Do not set a value on this prop

nly-table-lite/striped.description: Applies striping to the tbody rows

nly-table-lite/bordered.description: Adds borders to all the cells and headers

nly-table-lite/outlined.description: Adds an outline border to the table element

nly-table-lite/dark.description: Places the table in dark mode

nly-table-lite/small.description: Renders the table with smaller cell padding

nly-table-lite/fixed.description: Makes all columns equal width (fixed layout table). Will speed up rendering for large tables. Column widths can be set via CSS or colgroup

nly-table-lite/responsive.description: Makes the table responsive in width, adding a horizontal scrollbar. Set to true for always responsive or set to one of the breakpoints to switch from responsive to normal: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'

nly-table-lite/sticky-header.description: Makes the table header sticky. Set to true for a maximum height 300px tall table, or set to any valid CSS hight (including units)

nly-table-lite/no-border-collapse.description: Disable's the collapsing of table borders. Useful when table has sticky headers or columns

nly-table-lite/caption-top.description: Visually place the table caption above the table. Default is below.

nly-table-lite/table-variant.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the entire table

nly-table-lite/table-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the table element

nly-table-lite/stacked.description: Place the table in stacked mode. Set to true for always stacked, or set to one of the breakpoints to switch from stacked to normal: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'

nly-table-lite/head-variant.description: Header variant: 'light' or 'dark', or unset. May take precedence over head-row-variant

nly-table-lite/head-row-variant.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the tr element in the thead

nly-table-lite/thead-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the thead element

nly-table-lite/thead-tr-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the thead

nly-table-lite/foot-clone.description: Enable to the footer of the table, and clone the header content by default

nly-table-lite/foot-variant.description: Footer variant: 'light' or 'dark', or unset. May take precedence over foot-row-variant

nly-table-lite/foot-row-variant.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the tr element in the tfoot. Falls back to head-row-variant

nly-table-lite/tfoot-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tfoot element

nly-table-lite/tfoot-tr-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the tfoot

nly-table-lite/tbody-tr-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tr element in the tbody. Can be a function that returns a class (see docs for details)

nly-table-lite/tbody-tr-attr.description: Attributes to be added to each tr in the tbody, or a function returning such attributes (see docs for details)

nly-table-lite/details-td-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the td element in the details row

nly-table-lite/tbody-transition-props.description: Vue 'transition-group' properties. When provided will make the tbody a Vue 'transition-group' component

nly-table-lite/tbody-transition-handlers.description: Vue 'transition-group' event handlers. When provided will make the tbody a Vue 'transition-group' component

nly-table-lite/tbody-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tbody element

nly-table-lite/caption.description: Text string to place in the caption element

nly-table-lite/caption-html.description: HTML string to place in the caption element. Use with caution

nly-table-simple/id.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

nly-table-simple/striped.description: Applies striping to the tbody rows

nly-table-simple/bordered.description: Adds borders to all the cells and headers

nly-table-simple/outlined.description: Adds an outline border to the table element

nly-table-simple/dark.description: Places the table in dark mode

nly-table-simple/small.description: Renders the table with smaller cell padding

nly-table-simple/fixed.description: Makes all columns equal width (fixed layout table). Will speed up rendering for large tables. Column widths can be set via CSS or colgroup

nly-table-simple/responsive.description: Makes the table responsive in width, adding a horizontal scrollbar. Set to true for always responsive or set to one of the breakpoints to switch from responsive to normal: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'

nly-table-simple/sticky-header.description: Makes the table header sticky. Set to true for a maximum height 300px tall table, or set to any valid CSS hight (including units)

nly-table-simple/no-border-collapse.description: Disable's the collapsing of table borders. Useful when table has sticky headers or columns

nly-table-simple/caption-top.description: Visually place the table caption above the table. Default is below.

nly-table-simple/table-variant.description: Apply a Bootstrap theme color variant to the entire table

nly-table-simple/table-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the table element

nly-table-simple/stacked.description: Place the table in stacked mode. Set to true for always stacked, or set to one of the breakpoints to switch from stacked to normal: 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'

nly-tbody/tbody-transition-props.description: Vue 'transition-group' properties. When provided will make the tbody a Vue 'transition-group' component

nly-tbody/tbody-transition-handlers.description: Vue 'transition-group' event handlers. When provided will make the tbody a Vue 'transition-group' component

nly-tr/variant.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component

nly-td/variant.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component

nly-td/colspan.description: Number of columns this cell spans

nly-td/rowspan.description: Number of rows this cell spans

nly-td/stacked-heading.description: Heading for the cell when in stacked mode. Only applicable to cells in the 'tbody' element

nly-td/sticky-column.description: If this will be a sticky colum. Must be set on all cells in this column. table must be in sticky-header or responsive mode to work

nly-th/variant.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component

nly-th/colspan.description: Number of columns this cell spans

nly-th/rowspan.description: Number of rows this cell spans

nly-th/stacked-heading.description: Heading for the cell when in stacked mode. Only applicable to cells in the 'tbody' element

nly-th/sticky-column.description: If this will be a sticky colum. Must be set on all cells in this column. table must be in sticky-header or responsive mode to work

nly-toast/id.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

nly-toast/toaster.description: The name of the toaster target to render the toast in

nly-toast/variant.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component

nly-toast/is-status.description: When set to 'true', makes the toast have attributes aria-live=polite and role=status. When 'false' aria-live will be 'assertive' and role will be 'alert'

nly-toast/append-toast.description: When true, the toast will be appended to the bottom on the visible toasts, otherwise it will be prepended

nly-toast/no-auto-hide.description: When set, disabled the toast from automatically dismissing itself

nly-toast/auto-hide-delay.description: The number of milliseconds before the toast auto dismisses itself

nly-toast/no-close-button.description: When set, hides the close button in the toast header

nly-toast/no-fade.description: When set to 'true', disables the fade animation/transition on the component

nly-toast/no-hover-pause.description: When set, disables the pausing of the auto hide delay when the mouse hovers the toast

nly-toast/solid.description: When set, renderes the toast with a solid background rather than translucent

nly-toast/toast-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to add to the toast wrapper element

nly-toast/header-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to add to the toast header element

nly-toast/body-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to add to the toast body element

nly-toast/href.description: Denotes the target URL of the link for standard a links

nly-toast/to.description: router-link prop: Denotes the target route of the link. When clicked, the value of the to prop will be passed to router.push() internally, so the value can be either a string or a Location descriptor object

nly-toast/static.description: Renders the content of the component in-place in the DOM, rather than portalling it to be appended to the body element

nly-toaster/aria-live.description: When the rendered element is an aria-live region (for screen reader users), set to either 'polite' or 'assertive'

nly-toaster/aria-atomic.description: When screen reader's should read out the entire contents (set to string 'true') or just the changes (set to string 'false'). Leave blank for most cases

nly-toaster/role.description: Sets the ARIA attribute 'role' to a specific value

nly-tooltip/title.description: Text to place in the tooltip

nly-tooltip/target.description: Element string ID, or a reference to an element or component, that you want to trigger the tooltip.

nly-tooltip/triggers.description: Specify which triggers will show the tooltip. Supported values are 'click', 'hover', 'focus'. Refer to the docs for special triggers 'blur' and 'manual'

nly-tooltip/placement.description: Placement of the tooltip: One of 'top', 'bottom', 'right', 'left', 'top-left', 'top-right', 'bottom-left', 'bottom-right', 'left-top', 'left-bottom', 'right-top', 'right-bottom'

nly-tooltip/fallback-placement.description: placement to use when the tooltip would be out of boundaries. Refer to the docs for more details

nly-tooltip/variant.description: Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the component

nly-tooltip/custom-class.description: CSS class (or classes) to apply to the tooltip's root element

nly-tooltip/delay.description: Value for the show and hide delay. Applies to both show and hide when specified as a number or string. Use object form to set show and hide delays individually

nly-tooltip/boundary.description: The boundary constraint of the tooltip: 'scrollParent', 'window', 'viewport', or a reference to an HTMLElement or component

nly-tooltip/boundary-padding.description: The tooltip will try and stay away from the edge of the boundary element by the number of pixels specificed

nly-tooltip/offset.description: Offset (in pixels) for the arrow center compared to the trigger target element

nly-tooltip/no-fade.description: When set to 'true', disables the fade animation/transition on the component

nly-tooltip/container.description: The container element to append the rendered tooltip when visible. Default's to the body element

nly-tooltip/show.description: When set will show the tooltip

nly-tooltip/noninteractive.description: Wether the tooltip should not be user-interactive

nly-tooltip/disabled.description: When set to 'true', disables the component's functionality and places it in a disabled state

nly-tooltip/id.description: Used to set the 'id' attribute on the rendered content, and used as the base to generate any additional element IDs as needed

nly-button/variant.description: 按钮颜色 可选  default，primary，secondary，success，info，danger，warning，outlineDefaul，outlinePrimary，outlineSecondary，outlineSuccess，outlineInfo，outlineDanger，outlineWarning。要设置透明，传入null

nly-button/gradient.description: 按钮渐变色颜色，和variant只能选择一个。可选primary，secondary，success，info，danger，warning

nly-button/tool.description: 工具类按钮，默认非工具类。此时variant参数在不点击的情况下，只会改变边框颜色。可以使用bg-variant和gradient props改变背景色

nly-button/app.description: app类按钮.一般情况下是对图标使用的按钮。可以将图标变小，居中

nly-card-group/group-type.description: 卡片组类型 默认card-group，可选，default，deck，columns，accordion。deck水平，colunms当水平排列放不下，就垂直，先垂直一列，载垂直第二列

nly-card/bg-gradient-variant.description: 整个卡片背景色，渐变色可选primary，secondary，success，info，warning，danger，light，dark，lightblue，navy，olive，lime，fuchsia，maroon，blue，indigo，purple，pink，red，orange，yellow，green，teal，cyan，white，gray，graydark

nly-card/loading-content.description: 自定义loading文字内容，设置loading为true的时候，生效，传入内容会覆盖icon-loading

nly-card/loading-content-tag.description: 自定义loading文字内容标签，设置loading为true的时候，生效

nly-card/loading-content-class.description: 自定义loading文字内容css式样，设置loading为true的时候，生效，

nly-card/loading-icon.description: 开启loading情况下默认loading内容。如果传入loading-content，会覆盖loading-icon

nly-card/loading-img-src.description: loading图片url，在设置loading为true的时候，传入loading-img-src参数会显示loadingimg

nly-card/loading-img-class.description: loading图片自定义css式样，在传入loading-img-src的时候，loading-img-class生效

nly-collapse/accordion.description: 手风琴模式，手风琴分组字段

nly-collapse-noclass/accordion.description: 手风琴模式，手风琴分组字段

nly-dropdown/dropdown-icon.description: 下拉icon与文字对齐，默认不开启

nly-dropdown/data-show.description: 触发的显示的下拉内容，对应为nly-dropdown-menu的id prop，必传

nly-dropdown/placement.description: 下拉内容出现的位置，默认auto，会选择最节省空间的地方显示。可选auto，auto-start，auto-end,top，top-start，top-end，bottom，bottom-start，bottom-end，right,right-start，right-end，left，left-start，left-end

nly-infobox/bg-gradient-variant.description: 整个卡片背景色，渐变色可选primary，secondary，success，info，warning，danger，light，dark，lightblue，navy，olive，lime，fuchsia，maroon，blue，indigo，purple，pink，red，orange，yellow，green，teal，cyan，white，gray，graydark

nly-infobox/loading-content.description: 自定义loading文字内容，设置loading为true的时候，生效，传入内容会覆盖icon-loading

nly-infobox/loading-content-tag.description: 自定义loading文字内容标签，设置loading为true的时候，生效

nly-infobox/loading-content-class.description: 自定义loading文字内容css式样，设置loading为true的时候，生效，

nly-infobox/loading-icon.description: 开启loading情况下默认loading内容。如果传入loading-content，会覆盖loading-icon

nly-infobox/loading-img-src.description: loading图片url，在设置loading为true的时候，传入loading-img-src参数会显示loadingimg

nly-infobox/loading-img-class.description: loading图片自定义css式样，在传入loading-img-src的时候，loading-img-class生效

nly-form/validated.description: 添加was-validated css类,会自动验证表单内容,默认false

nly-form-input/max.description: 输入值的最大范围，type=number和range才有效

nly-form-input/min.description: 输入值的最小范围，type=number和range才有效

nly-form-input/maxlength.description: 输入值的最大长度，type='text'或者'password'时有用

nly-form-input/list.description: 输入时出现预先设定的option下拉列表，password无效

nly-form-input/lazy-formatter.description: 懒惰模式文本格式转换

nly-form-input/lazy.description: 懒加载模式，事件和v-model有效

nly-form-input/name.description: 放置form中，可以根据name属性取值

nly-form-input/required.description: html校验必填，放置form中，提交才会生效

nly-form-input/form.description: 指定归属表单，可以放置在表单外面

nly-form-feedback/text.description: 类型验证提示文本内容
